MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L8 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in North Hill Street, Barkis Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.49PM. Our engineers have now arrived on site to investigate the fault however due to difficulties resourcing engineers we are extending our time of restoration to 8.45PM. We apolagise for the inconvenience this may cause and thank you for your patience. We will update this message if any of this information changes. This message was updated at 6:30PM on 14th January 2021.
